timeline.bodyText:
StringUtils.isBlank(updatedImp.getTagid() whould never be true.
What they doing is checking, that in case if extImp.getTagId() and extImp.getDmxId() is null that tagId is present in recieved Imp.
SO if there are no tagId in Imp at the and we need to skip this imp.
Fix this

timeline.bodyText:
imps.stream()
                .filter(imp -> Objects.equals(imp.getId(), impId))
                .map(imp -> imp.getVideo() != null ? BidType.video : BidType.banner)
                .findFirst()
                .orElseThrow(() -> new PreBidException(String.format("Failed to find impression %s", impId)));
